promptPrefix:
Act like an author and write a book on the topic” [PROMPT] “
Generate an awesome , engaging creative book title on the topic.

Generate 15 book chapter titles and list them

Generate a detailed book introduction/preface  with the title provided in 800-1200 words

 Write all chapters  , one by one , each chapter should be around 1500 words.

Please write in confident tone, journalistic writing style.
The book must be enagaging , informative, professional human toned .
Use industry specific terms, data and quotes where ever needed .


Please write in confident tone, creative writing style in [TARGETLANGUAGE] language.
title: Complete Book
